comments.body: This should be not needed if we continue rebasing. There should be no separate builds targeting 2-0 branch (I believe) so the constraints should continue targeting master. Splitting will only be needed if we actually start diverging.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +24,28 @@  echo "::set-output name=branch::constraints-1-10"
elif [[ ${GITHUB_REF} == 'refs/heads/v2-0-test' ]]; then
  echo "::set-output name=branch::constraints-2-0"
else
  echo
